title: SOLD: 1887 N172 Old Judge - HANK O'DAY (HOF)
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1887 N172 Old Judge - HANK O'DAY (HOF)
posts.post_content:
Selling my 1887 Old Judge Hank O'Day - SGC 10

$SOLD - paypal friend preferred

Great, clean image of this seldom offered HOFer, flawed only by the pinhole at top.  First to email or PM me w/ an "I'll take it" will be the proud new owner.

Supersized image of front:
[img]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/hofrookies1/1887%20OquDay.jpg[/img]

Scan of back available upon request.
